mapper.insert: insert into purchase (p_id, u_id, s_id, i_code, i_regdate, e_date, i_pay) values (p_seq.nextval, #{u_id}, #{s_id}, #{i_code}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE+14, #{i_pay})
insert into purchase (p_id, u_id, s_id, i_code, i_regdate, e_date, i_pay) values (p_seq.nextval, #{u_id}, #{s_id}, #{i_code}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE+28, #{i_pay})
mapper.select: select * from purchase where ROWNUM <= 4 and (i_code = 'i_001' or i_code = 'i_002') order by i_pay DESC

select d.u_id, d.s_id, d.s_name, d.i_code, d.i_regdate, d.b_image, d.rnum from (select a.u_id, a.s_id, a.s_name, b.i_code, b.i_regdate, c.b_image, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.u_id order by b.i_regdate) as rnum from store a join purchase b on a.s_id = b.s_id join product c on a.s_id = c.s_id where (i_code = 'i_003' or i_code = 'i_004') ) d where rnum= 1

select * from purchase where u_id = #{u_id} and i_code = #{i_code}
